# Token Reference Table

This table lists all tokens for this component:

| Token | Description |
|-------|------------|
| view.shadow | Controls the shadow of the calendar view container.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-view-shadow |
| view.border.color | Sets the border color of the calendar view.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-view-border-color |
| view.border.style | Controls the border style of the calendar view. Acceptable values: solid, dashed, dotted, none.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-view-border-style |
| view.border.width | Controls the border width of the calendar view.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-view-border-width |
| view.radius | Controls the border radius of the calendar view.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-view-radius |
| fc.header.vertical.padding | Controls vertical padding of the calendar header.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-fc-header-vertical-padding |
| fc.header.horizontal.padding | Controls horizontal padding of the calendar header.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-fc-header-horizontal-padding |
| fc.header.text.font-weight | Controls the font weight of calendar header text. Acceptable values: normal, bold, 100-900.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-fc-header-text-font-weight |
| fc.time.text.font-weight | Controls the font weight of calendar time text. Acceptable values: normal, bold, 100-900.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-fc-time-text-font-weight |
| fc.events.gap | Controls spacing between calendar events.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-fc-events-gap |
| fc.daygrid.event.radius | Controls the border radius of calendar day grid events.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-fc-daygrid-event-radius |
| fc.v.event.main.color | Sets the main color of calendar events.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-fc-v-event-main-color |
| fc.popover.radius | Controls the border radius of calendar popovers.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-fc-popover-radius |
| fc.popover.heading.padding | Controls padding of calendar popover headings.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-fc-popover-heading-padding |
| fc.popover.title.font-size | Controls the font size of calendar popover titles.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-fc-popover-title-font-size |
| fc.popover.title.font-weight | Controls the font weight of calendar popover titles. Acceptable values: normal, bold, 100-900.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-fc-popover-title-font-weight |
| fc.popover.title.font-family | Sets the font family of calendar popover titles.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-fc-popover-title-font-family |
| fc.popover.title.line-height | Controls the line height of calendar popover titles.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-fc-popover-title-line-height |
| fc.event.background | Sets the background color of calendar events.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-fc-event-background |
| fc.event.color | Sets the text color of calendar events.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-fc-event-color |
| fc.event.dot.color | Sets the color of calendar event dots.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-fc-event-dot-color |
| fc.anchor.color | Sets the color of calendar anchor elements.<br>CSS variable: --wm-calendar-fc-anchor-color |
